measure.CatchLine: Allows the owner of property outside an urban growth boundary to site an additional dwelling on the property for occupancy by a relative of the owner.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Digest: This Act allows a rural homeowner to build a house for a relative. (Flesch Readability Score: 63.4). 
	Allows the owner of property outside an urban growth boundary to site an additional dwelling on the property for occupancy by a relative of the owner. 
	Takes effect on the 91st day following adjournment sine die.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to family dwelling units; and prescribing an effective date.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to family dwelling units; prescribing an effective date.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
